mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Miller, Jacob A. Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture right hand. Location Wounded: In action at Fisher's Hill, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/09/22. Nature of Wound: Canister shot. Result: Discharged on certificate.
